issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: AWS JAVA SDK S3 does not work with Eucalyptus Walrus

comments.body: AWS SDK is being evaluated for 3.3; unassigning so that this report is assigned to the right team
Let's track this issue in 2130, which will be delivered in 3.3.
Closing Resolved issues for released versions of the software.
